page.title: 06EDUCATION IN TOTLEY AND DORE
page.content: There are six schools in this area which cater for all ages. Five of these are Primary Schools and the other one is King Ecgbert Comprehensive School. Sheffield City Polytechnic has departments at the Totley Hall Lane site. Details follow about{All Saints Church of England {School}and the{Polytechnic. {ALL SAINTS C OF E PRIMARY SCHOOL {TOTLEY This school is at the top of Hill Foot Road.From this position you can look over farms,trees,woods,fields and moorlands.the school has 93 children,4 teachers and 1 child care assistant. There are 5 classrooms but one room isn't used. It has a staffroom, nursery, 2 class huts and a very big playing area. The hall is used for P.E,.assemblies,and meetings.The
